contentrichtext.text: {{Chinese |title=St. Anthony Parish |pic=Freguesia de Santo Antonio.PNG |picsize=200px |showflag=jp |s=圣安多尼堂区 |t=聖安多尼堂區 |p=Shèng'ānduōní Tángqū |j=Sing<sup>3</sup> On<sup>1</sup> Do<sup>1</sup> Nei<sup>4</sup> Tong<sup>4</sup> Koe<sup>1</sup> |y= |ci={{IPA-yue|sɪ̄ŋʔɔ́ːntɔ́ːnȅi tʰɔ̏ːŋkʰœ́ː|}} |mi={{IPAc-cmn|sh|eng|4|'|an|1|d|uo|1|n|i|2|-|t|ang|2|qü|1}} |por=Freguesia de Santo António |altname=Alternative name |s2=花王堂区 |t2=花王堂區 |j2=Faa<sup>1</sup> Wong<sup>4</sup> Tong<sup>4</sup> Koe<sup>1</sup> |p2= Huāwáng Tángqū |y2= |ci2={{IPA-yue|fáːwɔ̏ːŋ tʰɔ̏ːŋkʰœ́ː|}} |l2=the gardener's parish }} '''[[Anthony of Padua|St. Anthony]] Parish''' ([[Portuguese language|Port.]] ''Freguesia de Santo António'') is a [[freguesia]] on the western portion of the [[Macau Peninsula]]. It has the highest population density in [[Macau]] (98,776 persons per km²). The entire area is [[land reclamation|reclaimed]] from the sea. It is north of [[Cathedral Parish]], south of [[Our Lady of Fatima Parish, Macau|Our Lady Fatima Parish]], west of [[St. Lazarus Parish]], and east of [[Porto Interior|Inner Harbour]]. Population statistics as of 2006: * [[Area]]: 1.1. km² (16.4% of the peninsula) * [[Population]]: 109,000 (31.7% of the peninsular population) It includes{{clarify|date=January 2011}}: * [[Sha Gong]] (沙崗) * [[San Kio]] (新橋) * [[Patane]] (沙梨頭) Small-scale factories are mixed in between commercial residential areas. Tourist attractions include: * [[Camões Grotto]] (白鴿巢公園 or 賈梅士花園) * [[Cathedral of Saint Paul in Macau|Ruin of St. Paul's]] (大三巴牌坊) * [[Fortaleza do Monte|The Great Cannon]] (大炮臺) ==See also== * [[List of the most densely populated administrative units in the world]] ==External links== *[http://www.dscc.gov.mo/port/detail/frequesi.htm Freguesias da RAEM] {{Macau Freguesias}} {{coord missing|Macau}} [[Category:Freguesias of Macau]] [[Category:Macau Peninsula]] {{Macau-geo-stub}}
